unnormalised: **Energy & Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Interest**
normalised: **Energy and Utilities: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Sparking Interest**

unnormalised: Good news for all you Sharmajis and Vermas looking to go solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) is continuing its rooftop solar subsidy program, and folks are taking notice.
normalised: Good news for all you Sharmajis and Vermas looking to go solar! The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) is continuing its rooftop solar subsidy program, and folks are taking notice.

unnormalised: Forget those sky-high electricity bills, especially during Delhi's scorching summers! With subsidies available for systems up to 10 kW, installing panels on your terrace is now more affordable than ever. Think of all the lassi you can buy with the savings!
normalised: Forget those sky high electricity bills, especially during Delhi's scorching summers! With subsidies available for systems up to ten kilowatt, installing panels on your terrace is now more affordable than ever. Think of all the lassi you can buy with the savings!

unnormalised: The program gives a significant discount on the upfront cost, potentially cutting it by Rs. 40,000 or more, depending on the system size and your state's policies. Dr. Reddy, a renewable energy expert from IIT Madras, says installations are picking up pace, particularly in Gujarat and Maharashtra.
normalised: The program gives a significant discount on the upfront cost, potentially cutting it by rupee forty thousand or more, depending on the system size and your state's policies. Doctor Reddy, a renewable energy expert from I I T Madras, says installations are picking up pace, particularly in Gujarat and Maharashtra.

unnormalised: Local vendors are reporting a surge in inquiries, especially for residential systems around 500 sq ft to 1000 sq ft. So, ditch the worries, save some rupees, and harness the power of the sun! Check your local discomâ€™s website for details and eligibility criteria. Namaste!
normalised: Local vendors are reporting a surge in inquiries, especially for residential systems around five hundred square feet to one thousand square feet. So, ditch the worries, save some rupees, and harness the power of the sun! Check your local discom's website for details and eligibility criteria. Namaste!
